# seasonalbook

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An R package that supplements "Seasonal Adjustment in R", an online Book by James Livsey and Christoph Sax.

This is an early draft.

To preview the quarto book, run:

```sh
quarto preview
```

It watches for changes and live-previews in the browser.


To publish on https://christophsax.github.io/seasonalbook.content/, run:

```sh
quarto publish gh-pages
```
